title: Macallan 1990 Fine & Rare + GB 70cl
description: The Macallan Fine and Rare collection bottles were released with the motivation of recreating the very best vintages which Macallan had to offer. The collection came to the market in 2002 with the goal of showcasing the sheer range of vintage-statement whiskies that Macallan has produced and allowing the drinker or owner to take a journey through history Containing over 50 vintages that date all the way back to 1926. The idea was relatively simple to introduce a new vintage each year, continuing to build a vintage range unsurpassed in the industry. This unique bottle was distilled in December 1990 when it reached an age of 22 years back in 2013. It came from a single cask #24706 which contained 481 bottles.

title: Brora 40 Years 200th Anniversary Edition + GB 70cl
description: A bicentennial is as fine a reason to celebrate as we can think of, and Brora have chosen to do it in some style with the release of this 40 year old expression. The Highland distillery have matured the malt in American oak hogsheads since 1978, with 1812 bottles of the sweet and smoky expression now available

title: Lagavulin 26 Years Special Release 2021 + GB 70cl
description: The oldest, most exclusive single malt in the Special Releases 2021 is the Lagavulin 26 Year Old, a 1994 vintage matured in first fill sherry seasoned casks (both Pedro Ximénez and Oloroso). It has a nice, deep hue with brown and red hints.

title: The Macallan 25 Years Sherry Oak - 2020 + GB 70cl
description: The Macallan Sherry Oak 25 years old forms part of our Sherry Oak range which features a series of single malt whiskies matured in hand-picked sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez for richness and complexity. This special single malt delivers an intensely rich and full flavour character, citrus, dried fruits and wood smoke.

title: The Kinship 2021 Caol Ila 1980 40 Years 0,7ltr
description: Here we have a forty-year-old cask-strength Caol Ila, bottled independently by Hunter Laing as part of the ‘Kinship’ series. It’s limited to a run of 371, and owes its vanilla-and-oak profile to the refill American hogshead in which it’s been matured.

title: Tullibardine 1964 Custodian Collection + GB 70cl
description: From Tullibardine's Custodians Collection series, home to some astonishing expressions, comes yet another expression which could definitely also be described as astonishing. This single malt Scotch whisky was distilled all the way back in 1964 and left to mature for over 50 years before being bottled at cask strength! Expect notes of creamy vanilla, rich chocolate, nutmeg, tropical fruit and old leather furniture.

title: Port Askaig 45 Years + Wooden GB 70cl
description: A very rare example of Islay whisky at this age. Distilled in 1968, this is a combination of five sherry butts, which were married together for the final year. An exceptionally complex whisky that any Islay fan will savour.

title: Woodford Reserve Baccart Edition + GB 70cl
description: A limited-edition bourbon from Woodford Reserve that has been finished in specially-selected XO Cognac barrels – sourced by master distiller Chris Morris – and presented in a bespoke Baccarat decanter. Aromas of toasted oak, chocolate, creamy vanilla bean, cinnamon spice, dried fruit and orange peel fill the nose, complemented by notes of dark chocolate, caramel, dried fruit, rich malt, mocha and oak throughout the palate.

title: Flor de Cana 30 Years V Generaciones + GB 0,7ltr
description: A 30-year old, ultra-luxury rum aged in a single barrel since 1988. Flor de Caña V Generaciones is an exceptionally rare liquid in a beautifully packaged bottle, it features the signatures of the five family generations behind Flor de Caña, a bottle cap made from volcanic rock and a replica of the iconic 1902 volcano postal stamp of Nicaragua. Best enjoyed served neat.

title: Havana Club Tributo + GB 0,7ltr
description: To pay tribute to the know-how of the masters of Cuban rum, Havana Club Tributo is an annual limited edition, the 2021 edition is already the sixth edition and offers berry and raisin notes as well as a fine honey sweetness.

title: Ron Santiago de Cuba Isla Del Tesoro + GB 70cl
description: Isla del Tesoro (which translates as 'treasure island') is a rum from Santiago de Cuba which was formerly used as gifts by the Cuban government. Now available around the world, this exceptional rum is presented in a ceramic bottle and a wooden chest.

title: Bacardi Facundo Paraiso + GB 70cl
description: Paraiso is a meticulously prepared blend of some of the finest, most remarkable rums selected from the Barcardi family's private reserve. Paraiso contains the highest proportion of old rums from the family’s reserve. This exceptionally rich sipping rum is finished in French XO cognac barrels, some of which are over 60 years old.

title: Zacapa Royal Solera Gran Reserve Especial + GB 70c
description: The Zacapa Royal is the result of the meticulous work of the, master mezcladora, Lorena Vasquez, who brought together the rarest and most mature rums from Guatemala, creating a real treat for connoisseurs. Obtained from particular rums, some aged up to 30 years, the Zacapa Royal ages in French oak barrels Le Bois du Roy, forests once belonging to the royal kings of France, to which the Solera System is applied, a slow aging process that gives the distillate unique peculiarities. With a characteristic full color, Zacapa Royal opens to the nose with intense aromas of chocolate, toasted almonds, coconut and cream, with a pleasant sweet and exotic finish. A super premium liqueur that falls into the prestigious category of meditation rums.

title: The London No.1 3ltr
description: The London No.1 Blue Gin is distilled in small lots in the heart of London and produced out of 12 types of herbs and plants carefully selected to create a unique gin, to which they lend complexity, elegance, and perfect balance. During the 18th century, London was a world-renowned international trade centre, where all kinds of seasonings, herbs and spices were bought and sold. This is the reason why London gin is known and appreciated all over the world today. The quality of the ingredients, the distillation method, and the design of the bottle give this gin a unique character. With flavours of cinnamon, angelica, bergamot, and gardenia, The London No. 1 is quadruple distilled and was created by Charles Maxwell. Upon tasting it, you will sense the flavour of lavender, with flashes of spicy ginger and juniper and a subtle hint of sweet cinnamon, while the finish will reveal notes of succulent citrus.

title: Fallen Angel Blood Orange Gin - Ceramic Bottle 1,5
description: It's Fallen Angel Blood Orange Gin, but bigger! Yes, this is large ceramic head-shaped bottle holds 1.5 litres of Fallen Angel's Blood Orange Gin, packed full of rich citrus notes alongside classic herbaceous. Still a rather startling-looking bottle, perhaps even more so when it's larger.

title: Gin Mare + GB 175cl
description: The Gin Mare in magnum format from 175 cl is a Spanish distillate that comes from Tarragona, in the Costa Dorada. Its color is clear and transparent. The Gin Mare is considered to be a Premium, as it is produced with botanical ingredients of high carving. The elements contained in the Spanish distillate come from the areas of the Mediterranean and for this reason they are highly prized.

title: KI NO BI SEI Kyoto Dry Gin + GB 70cl
description: KI NO BI SEI is made according to the same intricate production method as the original KI NO BI, using 11 botanicals distilled in six distinct flavour categories, known as the 6 Elements. The final blend has been recalibrated by our distilling team to bring out the best of each botanical at the higher strength. This bottling is at the traditional Royal Navy strength of 54.5% abv, often confused with 100 proof, or 57.1% abv. In contrast with the original KI NO BI, which has a delicate and gentle profile, KI NO BI SEI has a thicker mouthfeel and full-bodied flavour, which works well in cocktails.

title: Copperhead Barrel Aged II 50cl
description: For our second edition of the Barrel Aged series, our classic gin in the well-known bottle rested for three months on unique Portuguese first-fill Madeira barrels. The result is a gin with a pink copper glow in the glass. In the nose it is enormously refined: fresh citrus and the warm sweetness of red fruit, figs and grapes meet the spiciness of nutmeg, coriander and - unmistakably - juniper. In the mouth, the recognizable flavor profile of the classic Copperhead Gin is enhanced with an increased complexity. A lush experience, where the botanicals of the gin form a harmonious whole with the light influence of the wood. The finish is warm and long.

title: Fallen Angel British Vodka + GB 70cl
description: An ultra-premium English vodka, DT1 from Fallen Angel is distilled seven times from grain. This clean and pure vodka comes with a pourer in the presentation box.

title: Louers Vodka + Wooden GB 1ltr
description: Louers vodka is a luxury vodka produced on Dutch soil. Each bottle is individually composed, bottled and numbered by professional Dutch craftsmen. This is unique in the vodka industry and guarantees the consistency in quality of every bottle produced. To guarantee quality, Louers vodka is produced in limited editions

title: Beluga Gold Line + GB 70cl
description: Beluga five-times-filtered Gold Line Vodka, presented in a handsome leather gift box. Top quality stuff great mouth-feel and personality to it. The bottle is wax sealed, hence why it comes with a little hammer & brush doohickey to help clean off all the wax.

title: Grey Goose VX + GB 1ltr
description: Grey Goose VX its crafted with a hint of cognac, which gives it a truly distinctive aroma and flavour profile without interfering with the vodka experience. Masterfully finished with a hint of precious cognac. When the world's best tasting vodka is masterfully crafted with a hint of precious cognac, a pioneering new spirit is born. Inspired by the heritage of grey goose creator and winemaker Francois Thibault, grey goose VX establishes a new standard in luxury spirits.

title: Godfather Platinum + GB 70cl
description: A high-quality Armenian vodka from Arssi Alliance, made to take the understanding of the finer things in life a step further. Particularly creamy mouth feel to this one, with a subtle but intriguing flavour profile.

title: Crystal Head Aurora Limited Edition 70cl
description: A unique, new expression of Crystal Head. Aurora Borealis is The Most Vivid Aerial Phenomenon and the Crystal Head Aurora bottle was created in celebration of this natural light display, with its beauty and mysterious visual properties. This super natural vodka is absolutely pure - containing no additives, no glycerol, citrus oils or sugars. Aurora uses high quality English wheat and pristine water from Newfoundland, Canada to craft an additive-free vodka. The vodka is five times distilled and filtered seven times. Three of the filtrations pass through layers of Herkimer diamonds as a final distinctive touch. Instead of exploring different flavours, Aurora was crafted using a different grain. It offers a drier, bolder, and spicier vodka while staying true to the Crystal Head house-style. The bottle, with its delicate and iridescent metallized finish, is a tribute to this natural wonder of the world. Presented in Black Gift Box.

title: Meukow Nec Plus Ultra + GB 75cl
description: Crafted exclusively from grapes harvested in the Premier Cru, the Meukow Prestige Nec Plus Ultra Grande Champagne Cognac is something truly special. It comprises the oldest eaux-de-vie from within the house's Paradis Cellar, presented in a stunning Baccarat Crystal decanter. The Cognac itself is wonderfully elegant with a mature structure. Persistent on the palate, this shows complexity and roundness, allowing aromas and tastes to evolve effortlessly. Truly a great example of a well-aged Grand Champagne expression.

title: Remy Martin Louis XIII + GB 70cl
description: The finest and most precious eaux-de-vie, made using grapes grown in Grande Champagne – the premier cru of the Cognac region – are carefully blended over the years to create the cognac inside every LOUIS XIII Classic decanter. Provenance and time are the very essence of LOUIS XIII cognac. Each drop represents a finely tuned craft passed down from one generation of Cellar Master to the next. The eaux-de-vie are slowly aged in old Limousin tierçons (traditional aged French oak casks). Every sip is a taste of time.

title: Courvoisier L'Essence + GB 70cl
description: A super-luxury Courvoisier, L'Essence is blended from over 100 ancient eaux-de-vies from Grande Champagne and Borderies and is presented in a Baccarat teardrop decanter suspended in a frame complete with a finely crafted crystal stopper, inspired by the signet rings given by Napoleon Bonaparte to commanders in his army in recognition of noble acts.

title: Meukow 1862 Esprit de Famille + GB 70cl
description: This cognac is a remarkable blend of the Grande Champagne terroir classified as Premier Cru de Cognac for 51% and 49% of the Petite Champagne terroir and 49% of the Petite Champagne terroir. It is therefore a Fine Champagne Cognac of great quality which has been named 1862 Esprit de Famille in homage to the first cognacs that entered the cellars of this House. The color is light amber. In the nose as well as in the mouth: the first attack is very floral with perfumes of white flowers such as spring hawthorn, cherry blossom with a very nice hint of violet, a characteristic of the very noble origin of fine champagne. The second attack is powerful in the mouth with hints of candied and stewed fruits such as Ente prune, Cretan apricot with some hints of walnut, nutmeg, cinnamon. The body is very harmonious between fragrances and more dense flavors such as musk, Cordoba leather, Virginia blond tobacco, with a very long finish of chocolate, mocha preciously coated with woody vanilla. Food pairing : at any time with friends with a tulip-shaped glass to capture the many layers of this cognac of pleasures. Perfect with an Arabica coffee and a Romeo and Juliet cigar. The bottles will be kept upright and protected from the light with, after several decades, a check of the corks which could be altered by time and would need to be changed.

title: Martell Cohiba + Coffret 70cl
description: Martell Cohiba is a unique composition of old eaux-de-vie from the Grande Champagne growth area. This superb cognac yields complex and intense aromas, honouring its Cuban kinship with Cohiba cigars. The perfect alliance of expertise that bears the seal of excellence.
